basics.label: And Architect
basics.summary: I am a student from Hyderabad pursuing computer science engineering. I have always been a curious person always taking things apart to understand how they work. Computers were always a big part of my life since young and studying computer science allowed me to know their inner workings. Now I mess around with a lot of projects and have implemented some of my ideas. The satisfaction of seeing something that you built run as it was supposed to be what drives me to constantly learn new things and experiment.
